page_content:
InfoGAN
•The discriminator in an InfoGAN does not have access to the class id, but must 
instead infer it from the samples it is given

U-Nets and Feature Pyramid Networks
•Image downsampling and upsampling can be combined to achieve a variety of 
multi-resolution image processing tasks output to be a full-resolution image. 
•Examples of such applications include
◦ Pixel-wise semantic labeling 
◦ Image denoising and super-resolution 
◦ Monocular depth inference 
◦ Neural style transfer

Deconvolution Network
